review: Love my Amazon Fire TV Stick, for Streaming it works well. I like PBS so I am able to catch Downton Abbey. It does give you some channels but like all streaming devices, you still have to pay for the premium channels. For what I need it suits me just fine. Just keep in mind that it does not have a browser app yet, waiting to see one, this would make it better, then I can catch my local news via the Internet. So I am keeping cable on a little longer until the browser app is working and in place.
author: Eddie T. "Video Shoots"

review: Temperamental would be a good description of the device. I love the Fire TV and thought I would get the Fire Stick for a secondary television. The Fire Stick wouldn't stay connected to the internet and when it did for a few minutes it couldn't deliver anything but the pre-programmed 'how to' video. I own several Fire tablets and the Fire TV box so I expected better. I'm disappointed with this purchase.
